title: Auditorium / Drama Theatre - In addition to Auditorium, Drama theatre / Natyagriha, Art Gallery, Exhibition Hall, Library, small restaurant to the extent of 20 sq
clause_text: Auditorium / Drama Theatre - In addition to Auditorium, Drama theatre / Natyagriha, Art Gallery, Exhibition Hall, Library, small restaurant to the extent of 20 sq.m. (forevery 4000 sq.m. reservation area) and allied uses such as guest rooms for the artists may be permitted.
section: 4.27 USES PERMISSIBLE IN DEVELOPMENT PLAN RESERVATIONS
